page.title: 16People and Police
page.content: The population can be divided into two groups. The first are farmers or farm workers, who have lived in the area for most or all of their lives. The second group are the 'commuters' who live in the new houses, and who work out of the area, sometimes travelling to Leeds or Bradford. Having their own transport, they can also shop out of the area, and take their children to school in Ripon or Harrogate. One rural beat police officer, who lives in a nearby village, covers this area. When he is off duty a rural beat police officer from another area takes over.
